ticket.title: config.gem will not load gems with a hyphen in the name
ticket.original-body:
I'm guessing that some kind of string to symbol malarky is causing gems loading to fall over for gems with a hyphen in the name e.g.
config.gem 'git-rails' config.gem 'mislav-will_paginate', :source => 'http://gems.github.com'
rake gems will not find either, even when they are installed.

version.title: config.gem will not load gems with a hyphen in the name

version.body:
Found the answer: http://ryandaigle.com/articles/2008/4/1/what-s-new-in-edge-rails-gem-dependencies
config.gems assumes the lib file is the same name as the gem hence the need to use :lib => lib_file_name
